properties.name: observability.logging.format
properties.description: Log output format: 'json' for structured JSON, 'text' for plain text.

properties.name: observability.logging.include-headers
properties.description: Whether to include HTTP request headers in MDC with 'header.' prefix.

properties.name: observability.logging.header-filter
properties.description: Comma-separated list of header names to include when include-headers is true. Empty means all headers.

properties.name: observability.logging.include-mdc
properties.description: Whether to include trace context (traceId, spanId, requestId) in log output.

properties.name: observability.logging.include-request-info
properties.description: Whether to include HTTP method and URI in MDC.

properties.name: observability.logging.service-name
properties.description: Application name included in structured log output. Defaults to spring.application.name.

properties.name: observability.logging.custom-fields
properties.description: Additional custom key-value pairs added to every log line.

properties.name: observability.tracing.endpoint
properties.description: OTLP gRPC exporter endpoint for sending trace data.

properties.name: observability.tracing.service-name
properties.description: Logical name of the service reported in traces. Defaults to spring.application.name.

properties.name: observability.tracing.sampling-ratio
properties.description: Sampling ratio between 0.0 and 1.0. 1.0 = all traces, 0.1 = 10%.

properties.name: observability.tracing.exporter-timeout-ms
properties.description: Maximum time in milliseconds to wait for the exporter to flush on shutdown.

values.description: Plain text output (default Spring Boot format).
